A Data Micro Data A detailed description the micro data we are using can be found (only in German) at http://www. forschungsdatenzentren.de/bestand/afid-panel_industriebetriebe/fdz_afid-panel_industriebetriebe_ metadaten.pdf. The panel includes all plants which belong to up to 68ÃÂ¢Ãâ¬Ãâ¢000 firms whose main activity or a significant share of activity lies in manufacturing or mining. Only plants within Germany are registered. The underlying data is collected on a monthly basis and then aggregated by year. The employment change distribution is shown in Figure 13.
